title: Enabler: Implement Template Handling in SNow@TC
description:
Description
Netcracker will use template based configuration for new sides.
For that, we need a Template handling in ServiceNow, so that the MIST Blueprints can be mapped to a template and a JSON data structure.
This mapping should be maintainable in the UI16.
acceptance_criteria: A mapping between Blueprints, Template Names and data structure can be stored
A UI page for maintaining this mapping is available

The source for attributes can be defined:
UI
Calcutaled (Flow)
Propagation based on catalog charcteristics
The mapping can be instantiated using JSON-Path to locate the attributes in the JSON structure
The mapping can be associated to a Catalog Specification
